text: Paramesha Panwala is a 2008 Kannada language film directed by Mahesh Babu, and produced by Aditya Babu, whilst the music was composed by V. Harikrishna. The film stars Shivrajkumar and Surveen Chawla in the lead roles. It was released nationwide on 5 December 2008. == Plot == ==Cast== *Shiva Rajkumar as Paramesha *Surveen Chawla as Shruti *Sonu * Srinivasamurthy * Ashish Vidyarthi as Don * Chitra Shenoy * Akul Balaji * Rekha * Sadhu Kokila * Sharan ==Reception== This movie also suffered the same fate as of other recent movies by Shivaraj Kumar. Even though the film was hyped as usual, it did not fare well in box office. ==Music== The film has five songs composed by V. Harikrishna with the lyrics penned by V. Nagendra Prasad and Kaviraj. The audio of the film released on 10 November 2008, at Green House, Bangalore. Album was released by Raghavendra Rajkumar and journalist P.G. Srinivasamurthy. ==References== ==External links== *Paramesha Panwala movie gallery Category:2000s Kannada-language films Category:2008 films Category:Indian films Category:Films scored by V. Harikrishna
title: Paramesha Panwala
